TITLE: Op-ed: Be sure to ask these 5 questions before hiring a new financial advisor
SUMMARY: There are more than a few factors to consider when deciding whether to work with a financial advisor. Here's a look at some key boxes to check before deciding.

TITLE: Where wealthy investors are putting their cash after SVB collapse
SUMMARY: The strategy of banks requiring wealthy clients to give them deposits or primary banking relationships in exchange for loans may be ending, advisers say.

TITLE: Here are the world's best airports for 2023
SUMMARY: Singapore's Changi Airport has been named the "world's best airport" for a record 12th time.

TITLE: Here's how to report 2022 crypto losses on your tax return
SUMMARY: If you’re still recovering from last year’s crypto losses, it may be possible to score a tax break on your 2022 return. Here's what to know before filing.

TITLE: Chinese tourists are traveling again — but not the way they used to
SUMMARY: In China, as elsewhere, the pandemic has sparked a shift in tourist behaviors, namely a preference for outdoor destinations and domestic travel.

TITLE: SVB execs sold $84 million in stock over the past 2 years, stoking outrage over insider trading plans
SUMMARY: Altogether, Silicon Valley Bank executives and directors cashed out of $84 million worth of stock over the past two years, according to Smart Insider.

TITLE: This individual retirement account option 'surprises people the most,' says advisor
SUMMARY: A spousal individual retirement account allows you to contribute based on your spouse's earnings if you file taxes jointly. Here's what couples need to know.

TITLE: Early retiree says these 8 books helped him save $1 million and 'live an uncompromisingly happy life'
SUMMARY: Self-made millionaire Steve Adcock retired early at 35. He didn't accumulate wealth from an inheritance or by running his own business. Instead, he learned to save and be successful in his career by reading. Here are the books that helped him achieve his goals.

TITLE: Michael Jordan's 'Last Dance' sneakers are going up for auction
SUMMARY: The Air Jordans are expected to be the most expensive pair of sneakers ever to appear at auction, estimated to sell for between $2 million and $4 million.

TITLE: Investing in 2023 is 'definitely going to be rocky,' advisor says. How to stay the course
SUMMARY: Silicon Valley Bank is the latest example of a surprise event that may spook the markets. Investors who hang on will be rewarded, one advisor says.

TITLE: Think your house is haunted and want out? Author Grady Hendrix has ideas on how to sell it
SUMMARY: In Grady Hendrix's new novel, "How to Sell a Haunted House," protagonist Louise runs into trouble trying to sell the house she grew up in. Are ghosts to blame?

TITLE: An A.I. chatbot asked Bill Gates what he wishes he could tell his younger self—here’s what he said
SUMMARY: Recently, the Microsoft co-founder sat down with U.K. Prime Minister Rishi Sunak as the two answered questions that were generated by an AI chatbot.

TITLE: Inflation isn't dampening people's desire to travel — but travel companies may be missing a trick
SUMMARY: Inflation and higher living costs may be weighing on consumers' wallets, but there's one area many are unwilling to cut back on: their desire to travel.

TITLE: Biden's budget pushes to renew bigger child tax credit payments for families
SUMMARY: President Biden wants larger child tax credits for parents as part of the pro family policies in his budget. But getting Congressional approval won't be easy.

TITLE: Families get these 3 things wrong about estate planning, advisor says
SUMMARY: Many clients think estate planning is "only for rich people," among other misconceptions, said Lee Baker, a certified financial planner based in Atlanta.

TITLE: When it comes to passing wealth on to kids, women have very different ideas to men
SUMMARY: Men and women have different approaches to wealth, and that affects how they plan to pass their money on to future generations, a new UBS report says.

TITLE: Many of Europe's 'golden visa' programs are closing — but demand is up in this Mediterranean hotspot
SUMMARY: Greece has seen a surge in the number of people applying for its residency by investment program while other European countries call time on such programs.

TITLE: Staying in British castles may be easier — and cheaper — than you think
SUMMARY: Storied Collection connects travelers with historically significant castles, manor houses and hotels in the U.K. — plus details about famous former guests.

TITLE: Barbara Corcoran shares her simple yet effective negotiating strategy: It's about 'ego and timing,' not 'price'
SUMMARY: After learning how to negotiate with people's egos instead of dollar signs, Barbara Corcoran taught the lesson to her mostly female staff. Here's how it works.

TITLE: President Biden’s proposed 2024 budget calls for top 39.6% tax rate
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden is proposing higher taxes on wealthy Americans to help cover priorities like Medicare and Social Security in his 2024 budget.

TITLE: A look inside a $22.5 million Miami condo with insane luxury amenities
SUMMARY: The touted amenities span over 70,000 square feet and 300 acres and include everything from a giant waterpark to a $1.2 million beachfront cabana.

TITLE: A simple rule can help you build a savings habit, says advisor: 'Do it no matter what'
SUMMARY: The 50-30-20 rule can help demystify budgeting and saving for anyone who feels behind financially.

TITLE: They moved abroad hoping to save money — here’s what they found out
SUMMARY: Many people move abroad hoping to reduce their cost of living. Like home, it often depends on where and how you live.

TITLE: An $18 million Ferrari leads record classic-car auction at Amelia Island. See all 10 top sellers
SUMMARY: Total sales at the Amelia Island classic-car auction reached $178.4 million — a record for the event, according to Hagerty.

TITLE: Biden calls for tax on the wealthy to extend Medicare funding
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden this week called for higher taxes on wealthy Americans to boost Medicare as part of his 2024 budget. Here's what to know about the plan.

TITLE: Why moving in retirement can earn you an extra $100,000 — or more
SUMMARY: Retirees who relocate to an area with lower home prices can earn big bucks to cushion their nest egg. But it may not make sense for everyone.

TITLE: 5 ways to file your taxes for free this season
SUMMARY: If you haven't filed your 2022 taxes yet, you may qualify for one of the free filing options. Here's what taxpayers need to know.

TITLE: Inflation boosted the 2023 federal income tax brackets. Here's how your taxes may compare to 2022
SUMMARY: The IRS adjusted the 2023 federal income tax brackets higher based on inflation. Here's how your federal taxes may compare to 2022.

TITLE: Travel demand fuels a boom in Asia Pacific — in hotel rates
SUMMARY: Hotel rates in destinations that are popular with Chinese travelers are 45% higher, with rates going even higher in Singapore and parts of Thailand.

TITLE: Mark Cuban found a car abandoned on the side of the road—and got it for a $0 down payment with a simple phone call
SUMMARY: When Mark Cuban was in his 20s, he had some money-saving ideas. Getting a car with no down payment wasn't among them, until he found one on the side of the road.
